home.title: Welcome to the official Nero Team page!
home.subtitle: Here you can find all our projects and download them. Our goal is to restore old games on Android and other platforms that can be revived. We also create our own projects for you to explore.

magnate.title: Magnate Bot
magnate.desc:
Game bot in the
economic strategy genre.
magnate.details:
Welcome to Magnate Bot — the ultimate economic game bot!

— Build an empire: start with a small business and turn it into a huge company, earning millions!

— Play games: roulette, crash, dream, dice, and more directly in the chat!

— Develop a mining farm: mine cryptocurrency and upgrade equipment for steady income.

— Complete tasks: daily missions, Magnate Pass, and company contracts with generous rewards.

— Interact with players: trade, compete, and form alliances in a friendly community.

— Become a legend: break records, lead leaderboards, and gain recognition as the top player!

— Use promo code MAGNATE for a starter bonus and start your path to success!

nr.title: Nero Raiders
nr.details:
Raiders, assemble! A collection of mysterious islands with unimaginable treasures and unique creatures awaits you! Play completely free and dive into the thrilling world of an MMO RPG that blends strategy with real-time battles.
Nero Raiders is a unique strategy game where you collect legendary heroes and fight millions of players online in various battle modes. Crush enemies with brute force, magic spells, or powerful ranged attacks — the choice is yours!
Key features:
• Completely free game with no in-game purchases.
• Use smart strategies to win PvE and PvP battles
• Explore mysterious islands and tombs to uncover vast treasures
• Turn your island from a humble settlement into an impregnable fortress
• Control every move of your heroes to showcase combat skills and win epic wars
• Build a massive army to achieve victory
• Craft and upgrade equipment to conquer the world
• Enhance heroes with special items, gear, and attributes
• Use each hero's unique skills to defeat enemies
• Destroy enemy settlements using various troop compositions and tactics
• Immerse yourself in an engaging game world with many challenging stages
• Defeat opponents in multiplayer modes

nero_raiders.title: Nero Raiders
nero_raiders.desc:
Strategy in the
'Build and Battle' style
nero_raiders.details:
Raiders, assemble! A collection of mysterious islands full of countless treasures and unique creatures awaits you! Play completely free and immerse yourself in the exciting world of MMO RPG with dynamic strategy and real-time battles.
Nero Raiders is a unique combat strategy game where you collect legendary heroes and compete with millions of players online in various battle modes. Crush enemies with brute force, magic, or powerful ranged attacks — the choice is yours!
Main features:
• Completely free game with no in-game purchases.
• Use smart strategy to win PvE and PvP battles
• Explore mysterious islands and tombs to discover vast treasures
• Transform your island from a humble settlement into an impregnable fortress
• Manage every move of heroes to demonstrate combat skills and win epic wars
• Build a massive army to achieve victory
• Craft and upgrade equipment to conquer the world
• Enhance heroes with special items, equipment, and attributes
• Use each hero's unique skills to defeat enemies
• Destroy enemy settlements using different troop compositions and strategies
• Immerse yourself in an engaging game world with many challenging stages
• Defeat opponents in multiplayer modes

help.title: Installation Guide
help.intro: Follow the instructions below to install.
help.more: If you encounter problems, please contact our support team. You can do this via Telegram or email support@neroteam.org.

1.title: Download APK
1.text: Confirm the download and wait a moment.

2.title: Allow unknown sources
2.text: To install apps from third-party sources, complete this step. This is done once.

3.title: Install
3.text: Click 'Install' to complete the process. Enjoy!

troubleshooting.title: Installation Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.subtitle: If you encounter installation errors as shown below, follow these steps:

video.title: Watch the video guide
video.download_hint: If the video does not play, you can download it:

tools.title: Required Tools
tools.description: You will need these apps for a successful installation:

shizuku.title: Shizuku
shizuku.description: Required to grant apps access to ADB

auth.title: Nero Auth
auth.description: Powerful authorization system. Ensures synchronization of game progress between devices and provides access to advanced features.

invite_code.title: Add a friend
invite_code.description: To add a friend, you must enter the friend code shown in their profile.

login.length: Login should not be longer than 15 symbols

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

password.weak: Password is too weak. Use at least 8 characters, including numbers, uppercase letters, and special symbols

code.resend: You can resend the code only after 2 minutes.
code.expired: The code has expired. Please request a new one

donate.title: Help Us!
donate.description: By supporting us in any amount, you accelerate development and improve the quality of the product being delivered. Help us to be better.
